languages.text: "Как говорят на Ифрите: "Нет звезды желанней той, что указует путь к Великому!" {n}Джай украдкой косится на Сестру битвы, протягивающую вам несколько номерных талонов.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Как говорят на Ифрите: "Нет звезды желанней той, что указует путь к Великому!" {n}Джай украдкой косится на сестру битвы, протягивающую вам несколько номерных талонов.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "As they say on Efreet: 'There is no star more coveted than that which points to the Exalted One!" {n}Jae casts a sidelong glance at the Sister of Battle as the latter holds out several numbered tickets to you.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Как говорят на Ифрите: "Нет звезды желанней той, что указует путь к Великому!" {n}Джай украдкой косится на Сестру битвы, протягивающую вам несколько номерных талонов.{/n}

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "As they say on Efreet: 'There is no star more coveted than that which points to the Exalted One!" {n}Jae casts a sidelong glance at the Sister of Battle as the latter holds out several numbered tickets to you.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “正如我们艾弗里特人说的那样：那些指向至高无上的神皇的星星，比天空中任何一颗星星都要更加耀眼！”{n}当这位战斗修女递过来几张写着编号的叫号票时，婕伊不禁斜着眼睛凝视着她。{/n}
languages.original_text: "As they say on Efreet: 'There is no star more coveted than that which points to the Exalted One!" {n}Jae casts a sidelong glance at the Sister of Battle as the latter holds out several numbered tickets to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “正如我们艾弗里特人说的那样：那些指向至高无上的神皇的星星，比天空中任何一颗星星都要更加耀眼！”{n}当这位战斗修女递过来几张写着编号的叫号票时，婕伊不禁斜着眼睛凝视着她。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Como dicen en Efreet: ¡"No hay estrella más deseada que la que indica el camino al Exaltado"!». {n}Jae lanza una mirada de reojo a la Hermana de Batalla, que te extiende varios números.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As they say on Efreet: 'There is no star more coveted than that which points to the Exalted One!" {n}Jae casts a sidelong glance at the Sister of Battle as the latter holds out several numbered tickets to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Como dicen en Efreet: ¡"No hay estrella más deseada que la que indica el camino al Exaltado"!». {n}Jae lanza una mirada de reojo a la Hermana de Batalla, que te extiende varios números.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「イフリートのことわざね。『誰もが望む至高の星はエグザルテッド・ワンを示す星！』ってやつ」{n}ジェイが横目でバトルシスターをちらりと見ると、アルジェンタは何枚かの番号札をあなたに渡す。{/n}
languages.original_text: "As they say on Efreet: 'There is no star more coveted than that which points to the Exalted One!" {n}Jae casts a sidelong glance at the Sister of Battle as the latter holds out several numbered tickets to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「イフリートのことわざね。『誰もが望む至高の星はエグザルテッド・ワンを示す星！』ってやつ」{n}ジェイが横目でバトルシスターをちらりと見ると、アルジェンタは何枚かの番号札をあなたに渡す。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Comme on dit sur Éfrit, il n'y a pas d'étoile plus convoitée que celle qui nous guide sur la voie de l'Exalté ! » {n}Jae jette un regard en coin à la Sœur de Bataille alors que cette dernière vous tend une liasse de tickets numérotés.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As they say on Efreet: 'There is no star more coveted than that which points to the Exalted One!" {n}Jae casts a sidelong glance at the Sister of Battle as the latter holds out several numbered tickets to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Comme on dit sur Éfrit, il n'y a pas d'étoile plus convoitée que celle qui nous guide sur la voie de l'Exalté ! » {n}Jae jette un regard en coin à la Sœur de Bataille alors que cette dernière vous tend une liasse de tickets numérotés.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Wie heißt es so schön auf Efreet: 'Kein Stern wird mehr verehrt als der, der zum Erhabenen zeigt.'" {n}Jae wirft einen Seitenblick auf die Schwester der Schlacht, als diese dir mehrere Zettel mit Nummern entgegenhält.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As they say on Efreet: 'There is no star more coveted than that which points to the Exalted One!" {n}Jae casts a sidelong glance at the Sister of Battle as the latter holds out several numbered tickets to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wie heißt es so schön auf Efreet: 'Kein Stern wird mehr verehrt als der, der zum Erhabenen zeigt.'" {n}Jae wirft einen Seitenblick auf die Schwester der Schlacht, als diese dir mehrere Zettel mit Nummern entgegenhält.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "İfrit'te dedikleri gibi: 'Göklerde en çok imrenilen yıldız, Görkemli'nin yolunu gösteren yıldızdır'!" {n}Harp Rahibesi sana birkaç fiş uzatırken Jae da göz ucuyla ona bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As they say on Efreet: 'There is no star more coveted than that which points to the Exalted One!" {n}Jae casts a sidelong glance at the Sister of Battle as the latter holds out several numbered tickets to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "İfrit'te dedikleri gibi: 'Göklerde en çok imrenilen yıldız, Görkemli'nin yolunu gösteren yıldızdır'!" {n}Harp Rahibesi sana birkaç fiş uzatırken Jae da göz ucuyla ona bakıyor.{/n}
